pacman.entries.ghosts.fair.environment

Class AntMaze

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.entries.ghosts.fair.environment.AntMaze

  • public class AntMaze
extends java.lang.Object
    The AntMaze represents the environment in which the HunterAnts and ExplorerAnts need to find their path. The AntMaze is build based on the current graph of the game (which changes according to the level).
    Author:
    Iris Hunkeler
